q: Not doing it is certainly the best way to not getting it.
If you find you are not valued and appreciated, then shift your attention to places where you will be valued and appreciated.
If you see yourself as prosperous, you will be.
Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
Emancipate yourself from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our mind.
You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day-by-day.
The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.
Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
Embrace the life you have and stop wishing that you could be someone else.
It takes a very long time to become young.
A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Your world is a living expression of how you are using and have used your mind.
Don't be afraid to stand for what you believe in, even if that means standing alone.
Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.

Anything worth doing is worth doing slowly.
It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.

Having an open mind is one of the most important qualities we can possess. Once our minds close, we stop evolving.
To love means loving the unlovable.

Life should be touched, not strangled.

Nothing like a health problem to turn up the contrast dial for the rest of life.
You can suffer the pain of change or suffer remaining the way you are.
The most important battle is one to conquer yourself.
The future is no more uncertain than the present.
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goals.
Character is destiny.
The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.
Live your life and forget your age.
I thought how unpleasant it is to be locked out; and I thought how it is worse, perhaps, to be locked in.
I would rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I'm not.
Enjoy when you can, and endure when you must.
We will now discuss in a little more detail the Struggle for Existence.
You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
What's obvious to you isn't obvious to most people. Operate from this perspective and you'll help more people.
It is better to learn late than never.

Society is composed of two great classes those who have more dinners than appetite, and those who have more appetite than dinners.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Be content with what you have, rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
Just keep swimming.
The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it, or learn from it.
You're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
The only way to get what you want in this world is through hard work.
a: Tiana, The Princess and the Frog

q: Adventure is out there.
The only thing predictable about life is its unpredictability.
Coming together is a beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision.
None of us is as smart as all of us.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.
Coming together is a beginning, keeping together is progress, working together is success.
Success is best when it’s shared.
Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
Great things in business are never done by one person; they're done by a team of people.
Teamwork begins by building trust.

When you hand good people possibility, they do great things.
Teamwork makes the dream work.
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.

Surround yourself with a trusted and loyal team. It makes all the difference.

The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
Effort and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
Success is not the work of one, but the work of many.
Together, ordinary people can achieve extraordinary results.
A successful team is a group of many hands and one mind.
The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.

None of us is as smart as all of us.
Collaboration allows us to know more than we are capable of knowing by ourselves.
The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
It takes two flints to make a fire.
Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
Teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.
Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.

If you can laugh together, you can work together.
No one of us is as good as all of us.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
Together we can do great things.
Synergy — the bonus that is achieved when things work together harmoniously.
